entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kentville AAFC 10:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: NNW 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM ADT Thursday 16 March 2023
